Updating data


var nReloads = 0;
function data(offset) {

  return ret;
}
var graph = Morris.Line({
    element: 'graph',
    data: data(0),
    xkey: 'x',
    ykeys: ['y', 'z'],
    labels: ['sin()', 'cos()'],
    parseTime: false,
    ymin: -1.0,
    ymax: 1.0,
    hideHover: true
});
function update() {
  nReloads++;
  graph.setData(data(5 * nReloads));
  $('#reloadStatus').text(nReloads + ' reloads');
}
setInterval(update, 100);
